source:
%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_absences

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    Abs_Type,
    Sickness_Group,
    Start_Date,
    End_Date,
    Attendance_or_Absence_Type,
    Days,
    Hrs,
    Start,
    End_time,
    Cal_days,
    Work_Schedule_Rule,
    Wk_Hrs,
    Hrs_Day,
    WkDys,
    Annual_Leave_Start,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_absences T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_absences) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql

CREATE VIEW  ST1 AS 
SELECT appealrefnumber,lastmodified,decisiondate,decisionsubmitdate,bespokeindicator,bespoketargetdate,processingstate,linkstatus,casecloseddate,pcsappealwithdrawndate,
numberofresidences,appealsdocumentscomplete,questionnairereceived,lpaconditionsreceived,lpaconditionsforwarded,statementsdue,lpastatementsubmitted,lpastatementforwarded,
appellantstatementsubmitted,appellantstatementforwarded,finalcommentsdue,lpacommentssubmitted,lpacommentsforwarded,statementofcommongrounddue,statementofcommongroundreceived,
appellantcommentssubmitted,appellantcommentsforwarded,thirdpartyrepsdue,thirdpartyrepsforwarded,sitenoticesent,proofsdue,lpaproofssubmitted,lpaproofsforwarded,
appellantsproofssubmitted,appellantsproofsforwarded,areaofsiteinhectares,dateofdecisionifissued,typeofapplication,appealsourceindicator,developmentorallegation,
amountdue,sitegreenbelt,lpaapplicationreference,lpaapplicationdate,datenotrecoveredorderecovered,daterecovered,callindate
FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_additional_data
GROUP BY appealrefnumber,lastmodified,decisiondate,decisionsubmitdate,bespokeindicator,bespoketargetdate,processingstate,linkstatus,casecloseddate,pcsappealwithdrawndate,
numberofresidences,appealsdocumentscomplete,questionnairereceived,lpaconditionsreceived,lpaconditionsforwarded,statementsdue,lpastatementsubmitted,lpastatementforwarded,
appellantstatementsubmitted,appellantstatementforwarded,finalcommentsdue,lpacommentssubmitted,lpacommentsforwarded,statementofcommongrounddue,statementofcommongroundreceived,
appellantcommentssubmitted,appellantcommentsforwarded,thirdpartyrepsdue,thirdpartyrepsforwarded,sitenoticesent,proofsdue,lpaproofssubmitted,lpaproofsforwarded,
appellantsproofssubmitted,appellantsproofsforwarded,areaofsiteinhectares,dateofdecisionifissued,typeofapplication,appealsourceindicator,developmentorallegation,
amountdue,sitegreenbelt,lpaapplicationreference,lpaapplicationdate,datenotrecoveredorderecovered,daterecovered,callindate;

CREATE VIEW ST2
AS SELECT appealrefnumber,caseprocess,caseworkmarker,costsappliedforindicator,level,procedureappellant,procedurelpa,proceduredetermineddate,targetdate,agriculturalholding,
developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,floorspaceinsquaremetres,sitegridreferenceeasting,sitegridreferencenorthing,historicbuildinggrantmade,incarelatestoca,
inspectorneedtoentersite,isfloodinganissue,isthesitewithinanaonb,sitewithinsssi
FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_add_additional_data
GROUP BY appealrefnumber,caseprocess,caseworkmarker,costsappliedforindicator,level,procedureappellant,procedurelpa,proceduredetermineddate,targetdate,agriculturalholding,
developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,floorspaceinsquaremetres,sitegridreferenceeasting,sitegridreferencenorthing,historicbuildinggrantmade,incarelatestoca,
inspectorneedtoentersite,isfloodinganissue,isthesitewithinanaonb,sitewithinsssi;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_all_additional_appeal

AS

SELECT 
    ST1.*,
    ST2.caseprocess,
    ST2.caseworkmarker,
    ST2.costsappliedforindicator,
    ST2.level,
    ST2.procedureappellant,
    ST2.procedurelpa,
    ST2.proceduredetermineddate,
    ST2.targetdate,
    ST2.agriculturalholding,
    ST2.developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,
    ST2.floorspaceinsquaremetres,
    ST2.sitegridreferenceeasting,
    ST2.sitegridreferencenorthing,
    ST2.historicbuildinggrantmade,
    ST2.incarelatestoca,
    ST2.inspectorneedtoentersite,
    ST2.isfloodinganissue,
    ST2.isthesitewithinanaonb,
    ST2.sitewithinsssi
    FROM ST1 FULL JOIN ST2 on ST1.appealrefnumber = ST2.appealrefnumber;

    select count(*) from T1;

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    Street_and_House_Number,
    `2nd_Address_Line`,
    City,
    District,
    Postal_Code,
    Region_State_Province_Count,
    Start_Date,
    End_Date,
    Charting_Officer,
    Charting_Officer_for_Inspector,
    Subs_PS_Group,
    Tel_No,
    Personal_Mobile,
    Work_Mobile,
    Chngd_on,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_addresses T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_addresses) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_email

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    first_name,
    last_name,
    email_address,
    text_line_manager,
    lm_e_mail,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_email T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_email) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_leave

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    number,
    deduction,
    ded_from,
    ded_to,
    absence_quota_type,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_leave T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_leave) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Pers_No)
        WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Pers_No)        
        ELSE Pers_No
    END as Pers_No,
    Last_name,
    First_name,
    CoCd,
    Company_Code,
    Loc,
    Location,
    PS_group,
    Pay_Band_Description,
    Org_unit,
    Organizational_Unit,
    PA,
    Personnel_Area,
    Personnel_Subarea,
    WorkC,
    Work_Contract,
    Org_Start_Date,
    Leaving,
    Act,
    Action_Type,
    ActR,
    Reason_for_Action,
    S,
    Employment_Status,
    Employee_No,
    Position,
    Position_1,
    Annual_salary,
    Curr,
    User_ID,
    Email_Address,
    Pers_No_1,
    Name_of_Manager_OM,
    Manager_Position,
    MAnager_Position_Text,
    LM_E_mail,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_leavers T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_leavers) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_protected_characteristics

AS

SELECT 
    ref_no,
    ethnic_origin,
    religious_denomination_key,
    sxo,
    disability_text,
    disability_code_description,
    disabled,
    ethnicity,
    religion,
    sexual_orientation,
    grade
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_protected_characteristics T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_protected_characteristics) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Pers_No)
        WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Pers_No)        
        ELSE Pers_No
    END as Pers_No,
    First_name,
    Last_name,
    Employee_No,
    CoCd,
    Company_Code,
    PA,
    Personnel_Area,
    PSubarea,
    Personnel_Subarea,
    Org_Unit,
    Organizational_Unit,
    Organizational_key1,
    Organizational_key2,
    WorkC,
    Work_Contract,
    CT,
    Contract_Type,
    PS_Group,
    Pay_Band_Description,
    FTE,
    Wk_hrs,
    Indicator_Part_Time_Employee,
    S,
    Employment_Status,
    Gender_Key,
    TRA_Start_Date,
    TRA_End_Date,
    TRA_Status,
    TRA_Grade,
    Prev_PersNo,
    ActR,
    Reason_for_Action,
    Position,
    Position_1,
    Cost_Ctr,
    Cost_Centre,
    Civil_Service_Start,
    Date_to_Current_Job,
    Seniority_Date,
    Date_to_Subst_Grade,
    Pers_No_1,
    Name_of_Manager_OM,
    Manager_Position,
    Manager_Position_Text,
    Counter_Sign_Manager,
    Loc,
    Location,
    Org_Start_Date,
    Fix_Term_End_Date,
    Loan_Start_Date,
    Loan_End_Date,
    EEGrp,
    Employee_Group,
    Annual_salary,
    Curr,
    NI_number,
    Birth_date,
    Age_of_employee,
    EO,
    Ethnic_origin,
    NID,
    Rel,
    Religious_Denomination_Key,
    SxO,
    Wage_Type,
    Employee_Subgroup,
    LOA_Abs_Type,
    LOA_Absence_Type_Text,
    Scheme_reference,
    Pension_Scheme_Name,
    Disability_Code,
    Disability_Text,
    Disability_Code_Description,
    PArea,
    Payroll_Area,
    Assignment_Number,
    FTE_2,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_specialisms

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    first_name,
    last_name,
    qualification_name,
    proficien,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_specialisms T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_specialisms) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom
